title: Effective Humor Utilization Strategies in Pharmaceutical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Pharmaceutical Knowledge and Understanding of Lecture-Based Instruction
context.additional_context: Proposing humor-based learning environment improvements for learners with scientific domain expertise

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more appropriate humor application cases in pharmacy education
Learners can explain five principles (self-deprecation/relevance/frequency, etc.) to consider when applying humor in lecture-based instruction
Learners can design one or more microlearning contents utilizing humor in digital environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
